alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:33PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MOBILE AND SOUTHWESTERN BALDWIN COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 433 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Theodore to Grand Bay. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gulf Shores, Theodore, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Point Clear, Dauphin Island, Bon Secour, Coden, Fort Morgan, and Alabama Port. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
